channel.title: Ens on Lib
channel.description: Recent content in Ens on Lib

item.title: Helpful Books
item.description: Books Living Well on the Spectrum: How to Use Your Strengths to Meet the Challenges of Asperger Syndrome/High-Functioning Autism Explains traits in detail and offers strategies for various aspects of life skills and domains of functioning Aspergers Survival Guide A short read with basic tips and coping strategies

item.title: Helpful Communities
item.description: Communities Aspergers Subreddit A friendly and helpful Reddit community Aspergirls Subreddit Life skills and healthy coping mechanisms for the ASD community

item.title: Helpful Organizations
item.description: :office: Organizations AANE The Asperger/Autism Network (AANE) helps people with Asperger’s and similar autism spectrum and neurodiverse profiles build meaningful, connected lives. Felicity House NYC NYC non-profit community space that organizes events for women with autism.

item.title: Helpful Videos
item.description: :computer: Video Resources How to Flirt and Get a Date Youtuber talks about masking, internalised ableism and adult diagnosis Alexithymia and Autism: What is it, coping and tips Video Resources for Women Tony Attwood - Aspergers in Girls Girls and Women and Autism: What’s the difference? - Sarah Hendrickx
